channel.title: [On hold] Add IFRC Appeals codelist to Humanitarian Scope vocabularies
channel.description:
Using the humanitarian-scope element it's already possible to link to Humanitarian Plan. I think the possibility to link to IFRC appeals would also be helpful. I know the Netherlands Red Cross would like to use this.
IFRC appeal numbers are maintained here: http://ifrc.org/appeals

item.title: [On hold] Add IFRC Appeals codelist to Humanitarian Scope vocabularies
item.dc:creator: Wendy
item.description:
I have recently had an initial discussion with IFRC in relation to adding the IFRC list of appeals to the Humanitarian Scope Vocabularary codelist. However, at this point in time IFRC are currently planning to undertake a feasibility study in relation to publishing to IATI so this is something that will be looked at as part of that work.

Read full topic
item.source: [On hold] Add IFRC Appeals codelist to Humanitarian Scope vocabularies

item.title: [On hold] Add IFRC Appeals codelist to Humanitarian Scope vocabularies
item.dc:creator: Wendy
item.description:
Thanks for raising @pelleaardema. I can see how this could be useful so I will follow up with IFRC with regard to adding their list to the Humanitarian Scope Vocabulary codelist (potentially as 2-2)

Read full topic
